short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimizer Discord's Sidebar with Auto Popup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the Discord Browser App, users can finally reduce the clutter found on both sidebars.

This extension will minimize both the discord server list sidebar and the discord channel list sidebar by sliding to the left of the browser window. To view the sidebars, simply hover your mouse on the far left side of the browser window and they will slide back to the original position. 

This feature has been highly requested by discord users since this functionality is available on the desktop app, but unavailable on the browser app. With this extension, this cosmetic feature is available to browser users.

Simple Explanation:
Popcorn Discord Chrome Extension minimizes both sidebars on the Discord Browser App and allows them to slide into view with a simple mouse hover.
